info.name: ResaVox
info.summary: CalDAV-native room booking via any calendar app
info.description:
# Room Booking
Book meeting rooms directly from your calendar app. No separate booking interface needed.
## Features - Rooms appear as CalDAV resources in any calendar app - Automatic availability checking and conflict detection - Auto-accept or manual approval workflow - Permission-based access (viewer/booker/manager roles) - Email notifications with iCalendar attachments - Per-room SMTP configuration
## How it works 1. Admin creates rooms via the admin panel 2. Rooms appear as bookable resources in calendar apps 3. Users book rooms by adding them to calendar events 4. The app automatically handles scheduling, conflicts, and notifications
info.author: Sam Ditmeijer
